headline: 5 P&C Insurance Stocks to Watch Amid Increased Digitalization
summary: Zacks Property and Casualty Insurance players like BRK.B, PGR, CB, TRV and ALL are likely to benefit from digitalization and catastrophes that drive policy renewal rate and pricing.

raw.headline: 5 P&C Insurance Stocks to Watch Amid Increased Digitalization
raw.summary: Zacks Property and Casualty Insurance players like BRK.B, PGR, CB, TRV and ALL are likely to benefit from digitalization and catastrophes that drive policy renewal rate and pricing.

headline: Piper Sandler downgrades Chubb as rising competition weighs on margins
summary: Investing.com -- Piper Sandler downgraded Chubb (NYSE:CB) to Neutral from Overweight following its second-quarter results, warning that rising competition and softening pricing trends in key segments may pressure margins in the quarters ahead.

raw.headline: Piper Sandler downgrades Chubb as rising competition weighs on margins
raw.summary: Investing.com -- Piper Sandler downgraded Chubb (NYSE:CB) to Neutral from Overweight following its second-quarter results, warning that rising competition and softening pricing trends in key segments may pressure margins in the quarters ahead.

headline: FAF's Q2 Earnings Beat on Solid Commercial Business, Investment Income
summary: FAF posts 20% EPS growth and 14% revenue gain in Q2 2025, driven by higher premiums, escrow fees, and investment income.

raw.headline: FAF's Q2 Earnings Beat on Solid Commercial Business, Investment Income
raw.summary: FAF posts 20% EPS growth and 14% revenue gain in Q2 2025, driven by higher premiums, escrow fees, and investment income.

headline: Globe Life Q2 Earnings & Revenues Top Estimates on Strong Underwriting
summary: GL's Q2 earnings increase 10% as strong Life and Health premiums offset declines in investment income and rising expenses.

raw.headline: Globe Life Q2 Earnings & Revenues Top Estimates on Strong Underwriting
raw.summary: GL's Q2 earnings increase 10% as strong Life and Health premiums offset declines in investment income and rising expenses.

headline: Chubb net income soars 33% to $2.97bn in Q2
summary: Consolidated net premiums written totalled $14.2bn, representing a 6.3% increase, or 7.1% when adjusted for constant currency.

raw.headline: Chubb net income soars 33% to $2.97bn in Q2
